import React from 'react' import '../css/Recipe.css' import DetailPage from '../pages/DetailPage' import { Link, Route, Switch } from 'react-router-dom' const Recipe = ({recipe,match}) => { const recipeImg = `https://spoonacular.com/recipeImages/${recipe.id}-480x360.jpg` let recipeDetail = recipe.find(p => p.id === match.params.recipeId) return ( <>

{recipe.title}

) } export default Recipe
